sentences.english: Like all marriages , they have their ups and downs.
sentences.chinese: 就像所有的婚姻一樣，他們也時好時壞。

sentences.english: When your good and bad, I can be when everything did not happen.
sentences.chinese: 沵的時好時壞，我都可以當佐什麼都沒有發生。

sentences.english: Macroeconomic choppiness is holding back more dramatic market euphoria.
sentences.chinese: 宏觀經濟時好時壞，抑制了更樂觀的市場情緒。

sentences.english: They can have their good days and bad days.
His administration’s handling of the financial crisis alternated between shaky and competent.
sentences.chinese: 布什政府處理金融危機的能力也時好時壞。

sentences.english: In early phase of rheumatoid arthritis, the disease is characterized by remissions and relapses.
sentences.chinese: 類風溼關節炎的早期特徵是時好時壞。

sentences.english: He and his wife and three daughters saw both good times and bad times.
sentences.chinese: 他和他的妻子和三個女兒看到時好時壞倍。
